content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The Extraordinary General Meeting of AqualisBraemar ASA will be held in Oslo in September 2019

Date: 27th September 2019
Time: 10:00 CET
Venue: Advokatfirmaet Haavind AS at Bygdøy allé 2, 0257 Oslo

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Log in to the meeting” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”turquoise” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-user-circle” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Finvestor.vps.no%2Fgm%2FlogOn.htm%3Ftoken%3D1190e74f0f162eadac7801ccdd627e50f70d96ca%26validTo%3D1572163200000%26oppdragsId%3D20190905VPKJWMU0||target:%20_blank|”][vc_column_text]

Related documents

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Notice of EGM 2019″ style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”turquoise” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-text-o” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F09%2FAqualisBraemar-EGM-Sept-2019-notice_Finaladj.pdf|||”][vc_btn title=”Proposal from the Nomination Committee” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”turquoise” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-text-o” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F09%2FProposal-from-the-Nomination-Committee-AqualisBraemar_Final.pdf|||”][vc_btn title=”Registration and proxy forms” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”turquoise” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-text-o” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F09%2FPa%CC%8Ameldings-og-fullmaktsblanketter-Engelsk_Final.pdf|||rel:nofollow”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
